mapper.select: SELECT seq, faq_type, faq_subject, faq_content, faq_order, chk_at, del_at, ins_dttm, upt_dttm, ins_user, upt_user FROM t_faq WHERE seq = #{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_faq (faq_type, faq_subject, faq_content, faq_order, chk_at, del_at, ins_dttm, ins_user) VALUES (#{faqType}, #{faqSubject}, #{faqContent}, #{faqOrder}, #{chkAt}, #{delAt}, now(), #{insUser})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_faq SET faq_type = #{faqType}, faq_subject = #{faqSubject}, faq_content = #{faqContent}, faq_order = #{faqOrder}, chk_at = #{chkAt}, del_at = #{delAt}, upt_dttm = now(), upt_user = #{uptUser} WHERE seq = #{seq}
